item.description:
Click Here to Register: http://www.subconsciouschange.com/psych-k-facilitator-training-and-community-events/basic-psych-k-workshops

What will I learn at a Basic PSYCH-K Workshop?

DAY 1

In the Basic Workshop you will be introduced to some new concepts and ideas. One of the most profound ideas is that we ALL have the ability to change the old “programs” in our subconscious mind. Every thought or belief that currently exists in the subconscious mind.

Many Old Ideas Or Subconscious Beliefs No Longer Serve You!

The good news is that you can take action to change them. The changes are fast as well as easy to make.

The PSYCH-K Workshop is highly experiential! We have a lot of fun and get a lot accomplished at the same time.

We will:

  • We spend a couple hours getting to know one another
  • Begin the PSYCH-K structure which allows a safe environment for sharing and creating rapport with the other attendees.
  • You will be partnering with other students in the workshop by mid morning. We will frequently change partners during the two days so you get lots of experience using your new skills. Even people who view themselves as shy or introverted open up to exploring and having fun!
  • One of the first new skills you will learn is how to properly facilitate Kinesiology or “Muscle Testing” so you get reliable results every time. 
    • Kinesiology is easy to learn when taught properly. We spend enough time on this subject so everyone in the workshop feels capable of doing it well. The entire structure of workshops in PSYCH-K rest firmly upon the Kinesiology results.

How Is Kinesiology Applied In PSYCH-K Workshops?

Most people apply way too much pressure upon the arm being used for testing. We use a light touch with a little bit of energy. We are testing changes in the electrical signals being sent through the body system from the subconscious, we are never testing the strength of the muscle.

If you already know Muscle Testing you are likely to pick up on some amazing and key differences which can enhance your use of this valuable skill in other modalities. Many seasoned professionals who use Muscle Testing have been very intrigued with the benefits they gain learning the light touch philosophy. Teaching excellence in Muscle Testing is one of Karen’s greatest skills.

The first afternoon we will learn two Balances. Balances are processes which allow us to make change within the subconscious mind. Think of them as tools in your new tool kit. Once you learn how to use these tools a whole new world will open up to you. Your life is about to change for the better!

JOIN US for thisTWO DAY TRAINING

Saturday & Sunday,
March 23-24, 2013

9:00 AM—6:00 PM

Theosophical Society, 21 Maple Street, Arlington, MA 02476

Workshop Fee: $600.00
Bring a Buddy Special: $500.00/each
Repeat Students: $100.00
Payment plans are available, Special needs considered, Call for options
Deposit of $200.00 holds your reservation!

Workshop Sponsor:

Ellen Sklaver 617-750-4830 ellen.s.sklaver@gmail.com
Karen McKy, MHt International Certified PSYCH-K Instructor

See you there!!
